title: Futuristic Combat - Audio Pack
description: Your futuristic combat with high quality Sound Effects! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This is a package created with futuristic combat sounds in mind, in which you can sound various animations related to combat in your game. There are lasers, explosions, dashs, portals, teleports, among others.


These sounds were made thinking about letting the player super immersed in the game he's playing, making his experience go to another level!


It is worth mentioning that these sounds were named after the visual reference of when they were created, but you can use them for several other scenarios that serve you.


Also, you'll get the background music on the preview for free :D


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Here is the complete list of sounds:


  • Dash_v1
  • Dash_v2
  • Dash_v3
  • Dash_v4
  • Explosion_v1
  • Explosion_v2
  • Explosion_v3
  • Heavy_Weapon_v1
  • Heavy_Weapon_v2
  • Laser_Shot_v1
  • Laser_Shot_v10
  • Laser_Shot_v2
  • Laser_Shot_v3
  • Laser_Shot_v4
  • Laser_Shot_v5
  • Laser_Shot_v6
  • Laser_Shot_v7
  • Laser_Shot_v8
  • Laser_Shot_v9
  • Light_Saber_v1
  • Light_Saber_v2

  • Panel_v1

  • Power_Up_v1
  • Power_Up_v2

  • Shield_v1
  • Shield_v2
  • Shut_Down_v1
  • Shut_Down_v2
  • Siren_v1
  • Teleport_v1
  • Unload_v1
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 123

Number of Audio Cues: 123

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that loops contains "loop" on the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
